messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]Conference and Loneliness
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m in TX.  It d be great to have one near here, too. ... I ll look forward to that one.  I ve got family in NC we could stay with to cut costs. Stephanie
messages.messageBody:
> Would there be a southeast sister to the
> northeast group?
> I live in SC.

I'm in TX. It'd be great to have one near here,
too.

> We won't be having anything locally this year,
> but in 2008 we'll be in
> Asheville, NC.

I'll look forward to that one. I've got family
in NC we could stay with to cut costs.

Stephanie Jackson, Mommie to Clara Rhyse and Bella Pearl
Learning Through Living

We don't inherit the Earth from our parents.
We borrow it from our children.












__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
http://mail.yahoo.com

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]Conference and Loneliness
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: Renee McGraw  Would there be a southeast sister to the northeast group? I live in SC. -=-=-=-=-=- Hey, Renee! You missed the
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Renee McGraw <mwaynejr@...>

Would there be a southeast sister to the northeast group?
I live in SC.

-=-=-=-=-=-

Hey, Renee! You missed the first two which were held in Columbia! Sorry!

We won't be having anything locally this year, but in 2008 we'll be in
Asheville, NC.

We do meet at my house once a month or so. 803 776 4849

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

"The hardest problem for the brain is not learning, but forgetting. No
matter how hard we try, we can't deliberately forget something we have
learned, and that is catastrophic if we learn that we can't learn."
~Frank Smith

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics]Conference and Loneliness
messages.msgSnippet: Would there be a southeast sister to the northeast group? I live in SC. Thanks, Renee ... From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
messages.messageBody:
Would there be a southeast sister to the northeast group?
I live in SC.

Thanks,
Renee
-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com]On Behalf Of Deb
Sent: Monday, May 22, 2006 9:04 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]Conference and Loneliness


--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, ohpurple1@... wrote:

> But not at the conferences!!!!:)>>
> Is it possible for a family (mom and four kids as dh has a
>commitment) to
> crash the conference in Peabody this weekend? We would be coming on
>Sunday for
> the day. If so, what would it cost us?
>
> Thank you,
> Robin in Cape Cod
>
Check the NEUConference Yahoo group or go to the
northeastunschoolingconference website and email our very own
conference diva, Kathryn, to get more info on your questions

--Deb

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]Conference and Loneliness
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/21/2006 12:17:38 PM Eastern Standard Time, zenmomma@comcast.net writes: because loneliness is a real issue with unschooling sometimes.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/21/2006 12:17:38 PM Eastern Standard Time,
zenmomma@... writes:
because loneliness is a real issue with unschooling sometimes."

But not at the conferences!!!!:)>>
Is it possible for a family (mom and four kids as dh has a commitment) to
crash the conference in Peabody this weekend? We would be coming on Sunday for
the day. If so, what would it cost us?

Thank you,
Robin in Cape Cod
